did.unittitle: Later Draft, Version B.4, unedited photocopy of Later Draft, Version A.1, p. 1-295 [very scattered], 432-65 [scattered; duplicates p. 1, 95]. Pages 434, 448, 449, and unnumbered pages after 449 are photocopies of photocopies.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Original photocopies were used to type carbons of letters on the reverse side and are in the Knopf correspondence files re: The Weedkiller's Daughter.
